snippet: SOMERSTEIN--Judith, MSW, 85. Died on March 20, 2016. Judy loved her husband, three daughters and seven grandchildren and adored her brother. A graduate of Erasmus Hall High School, Brandeis University and New York School of Social Work, she was a woman of strong conviction who will be deeply missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SOMERSTEIN--Judith, MSW, 85. Died on March 20, 2016. Judy loved her husband, three daughters and seven grandchildren and adored her brother. A graduate of Erasmus Hall High School, Brandeis University and New York School of Social Work, she was a woman of strong conviction who will be deeply missed. 1/3
